txt.en: 'You may have seen the spider-queen who calls the nearby lair home. You can find her east of here -- don't hurt your legs jumping off!\n\n'Defeat her, and my breath will come a little easier.'
'Your efforts are much appreciated, [placeholder]. I don't care how many spider-queens rise, I am determined to see them all destroyed!'
Klintur is appalled by the sheer number of spiders and believes that killing off their queen may help reduce the damage they inflict upon the halls of Khazad-d√ªm.
The spider-lair is due east of the Shadowed Refuge, which is on the western edge of the Foundations of Stone.\n\nKlintur has asked you to defeat the spider-queen who prowls the nearby spider lair.
Speak to Klintur at the Shadowed Refuge
Klintur is at the Shadowed Refuge, above the spider-lair.\n\nYou should return to Klintur and reassure him that Uanuiloth has been defeated.
